explains: v. 排练，排演；监督（表演者或团体）排演；默诵，默默地练习；<正式>详述，重复

sentences.en: We were given only two weeks to rehearse.
sentences.cn: 只给了我们两个星期排练。

sentences.en: They see the result they want clearly and rehearse it over and over again.
sentences.cn: 他们清楚地看到自己想要的结果，然后一遍又一遍地预演。

sentences.en: Create a "character"—an unshy version of yourself—and rehearse your own scenes.
sentences.cn: 创造一个“角色”——一个不害羞的你——并排练你自己的场景。
